channel.title: When you die making you lose stuff, and Making nonwild area wild
channel.description:
Also whenever you die, you dont lose stuff. Whatever playerrights you are.. how would i fix it?
I'm trying to make everywhere around yanille except for bank wild, and this is what i did.
[code]|| (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) ||[/code]
I tried probably every combination of this possible, and it does not work, i put this under public boolean isinwilderness, in other servers it is public boolean nonWild.
I just need help with this simple thing that i cannot figure out.
Also whenever you die, you dont lose stuff. Whatever playerrights you are.. how would i fix it?

item.title: When you die making you lose stuff, and Making nonwild area wild
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

Mercifies:

yes but you need to make an area around the bank. Meaning youll have to break it up into 4 different squares around the bank ~ hence forth the four codes.

Oh okay thanks, but why does edgeville bank stay wild?

Read full topic
item.source: When you die making you lose stuff, and Making nonwild area wild

item.title: When you die making you lose stuff, and Making nonwild area wild
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

yes but you need to make an area around the bank. Meaning youll have to break it up into 4 different squares around the bank ~ hence forth the four codes.

item.title: When you die making you lose stuff, and Making nonwild area wild
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:7, topic:300346”]ok then.

Make sure you have 4 lines and rectangles (or squares) outside of the bank on each side of the bank to cover the outside. I don’t have coordinates so I can’t make the code for you but this may help?

|| (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) || || (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) || || (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) || || (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) ||[/quote]

I tried making a huge rectangle to start. I do not understand, it works when i make it inside the bank but then outside the bank, it doesnt… these are the coords i have

2608 3104
2539 3104

2540 3078
2608 3078

Read full topic
item.source: When you die making you lose stuff, and Making nonwild area wild

item.title: When you die making you lose stuff, and Making nonwild area wild
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

ok then.

Make sure you have 4 lines and rectangles (or squares) outside of the bank on each side of the bank to cover the outside. I don’t have coordinates so I can’t make the code for you but this may help?

|| (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) || || (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) || || (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) || || (absX >= 3104 && absX <= 2608 && absY >= 2608 && absY <= 3079) ||

Read full topic

hmm. Try making the bank only wild and see if the outskirts of the bank are wild. It may be backwards to what the creator intended it to be

inside of the bank is wild but outside is not
